Our Website Design Packages

Our website packages have been tailored to offer value for money depending on what you want to achieve. Select from one of our packages below:

Note: Services tangential to website design such as copy writing and content generation will attract extra fees, which will be communicated promptly.

Standard

Best for small businesses and professionals just starting out on their digital journey

KSH. 10,000

  •  Turnaround: 5-7 Business Days
  •  Custom Website Domain e.g yourbusiness.com
  •  One Year Website Hosting
  •  Secure your Site with SSL Certificate
  •  Three Months Free Website Maintenance
  •  Up To 5 Static, Visually-Appealing Pages
  •  Responsive Design i.e mobile-friendly
  •  Basic Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Express Interest

Professional

For established businesses who want to engage their audience more in the digital space

KSH. 20,000

  •  Turnaround: 10-14 Business Days
  •  Same benefits as the Standard Package Plus More
  •  Up To 10 Dynamic Visually-Appealing Pages
  •  Database Integration
  •  Google Analytics Integration
  •  Administrative Dashboard
  •  Custom logo design
  •  Custom Emails e.g sales@your-business.com
  •  Intermediate Search Engine Optimisation (SEO)
Express Interest

Pro Ultra

Automate workflows on the web e.g payments, hiring, bookings, etc.

From KSH. 35,000

  •  Turnaround: From 21 Business Days
